headline: Mine Closure in China Sparks Lithium ETFs Rally
summary: Lithium ETFs like LITP, ILIT, LIMI and LIT soar after CATL halted output at China's largest lithium mine, sparking hopes of easing the global supply glut.

raw.headline: Mine Closure in China Sparks Lithium ETFs Rally
raw.summary: Lithium ETFs like LITP, ILIT, LIMI and LIT soar after CATL halted output at China's largest lithium mine, sparking hopes of easing the global supply glut.

headline: Albemarle says Chile lithium plant operating normally after incident last week
summary: SANTIAGO (Reuters) -Albemarle's La Negra lithium processing plant in Chile is operating normally after an "incident" last week, the company told Reuters on Tuesday, after a local lawmaker said authorities had opened an investigation.  There were no injuries and sales of the metal used to make lithium-ion batteries are not expected to be affected, Albemarle said, without providing additional details.  Albemarle gave no more details of the incident.

headline: Albemarle Stock: Analyst Estimates & Ratings
